# AI Image Generation Prompts

Professional image prompts for blog article thumbnails.

**Generated by Codex AI**

---

## AAPL

### Enterprise

**DALL-E:**
```
Modern enterprise office with MacBooks and iPads on glass conference table, Apple silver and space gray devices, professional executives collaborating, floor-to-ceiling windows showing city skyline, sophisticated corporate photography, 1200x630 business editorial style.
```

**Midjourney:**
```
Apple enterprise deployment scene, sleek boardroom, MacBook Pro array, professional setting, silver and gray tones, natural window lighting --ar 1200:630 --v 6
```

**Stable Diffusion:**
```
Corporate environment showcasing Apple devices in professional use, clean minimalist aesthetic, silver hardware on dark table, business growth graph overlay, premium blog thumbnail.
```

**Style Notes:**
> Apple silver + space gray; convey professionalism and productivity; subtle financial success indicators.

---

### Premium Iphone

**DALL-E:**
```
Luxurious Apple iPhone lineup displayed on a brushed aluminum pedestal, Apple silver and deep midnight blue palette, soft studio lighting with reflected highlights, elegant golden stock graph arc behind, 1200x630 frame, premium editorial style.
```

**Midjourney:**
```
Apple premium iPhone strategy visualization, minimalist showroom, glass pedestal, cool white + midnight colors, subtle gold investment cues, clean typography zone --ar 1200:630 --v 6 --style raw
```

**Stable Diffusion:**
```
Photoreal composition of premium iPhone close-up with stainless steel edges, soft depth-of-field, transparent financial overlay (revenue growth curve) in muted gold, modern serif headline space, professional tech-finance aesthetic.
```

**Style Notes:**
> Stick to Apple monochrome + midnight palette; emphasize craftsmanship macro shots; add understated gold elements to signal profit story without clutter.
